name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 2, someone threw leaflets from a high-rise building near the He Long Sports Center in Changsha, criticizing the court for favoring enterprises in labor disputes and bending the law for personal gain.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 2, in Lufeng, Guangdong, a designated driver was hit by a vehicle while taking shelter from the rain at the entrance of a supermarket. According to reports, the injured have been sent to the hospital for emergency treatment. The victim’s colleagues described that the driver and the passengers got out of the car and fled the scene, suspected of drunk driving.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 2, a robbery of a gold shop occurred in Jiangxiang Town, Nanchang, Jiangxi Province.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of June 2, a vigil for the victims of the June 4th Incident was held in front of the London Embassy

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is reported that Douyin's overseas live broadcast system was upgraded and maintained during the June 4th period

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: World of Tanks announced that the chat system in the game will be maintained during the 64-hour period. During the maintenance period, the chat and name change system will be unavailable.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Commemoration ceremony for the 35th anniversary of June 4th in front of Parliament Square in London, UK

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
As the 35th anniversary of June 4th approaches, we cooperate with Human Rights in China @hrichina and Humanitarian China @HChina89 to release a series of special photos of June 4th. Scene of the 1989 Democracy Movement No. 21 (June 2)
[The first drop of blood of the Beijing student movement] [Martial law troops sneak in in plain clothes] [Watch the goddess first, then "Hou"]

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 2, commemoration of the 35th anniversary of the June 4th Incident in Flushing, New York

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Earlier, two protesters appeared at the scene and shouted to the mourning crowd, "Long live the Communist Party" and "Go back to Taiwan!"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 2, Linyi, Shandong. The TOEFL Taikang City real estate project was left unfinished, and the owners held up banners to protest their rights.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Chinese Defense Minister Dong Jun pointed out at the Shangri-La Dialogue in Singapore on June 2: Anyone who dares to split Taiwan from China will be crushed to pieces and bring about their own destruction.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 2, at the Shangri-La Dialogue in Singapore, Ukrainian President Zelensky accused China of lobbying African and South American countries not to attend the Ukrainian Peace Summit, and lamented that "it is unfortunate that an independent and powerful country like China has become a tool in Putin's hands." 
On the same day, Xu Hui of the National Defense University called out to Zelensky: "I would like to advise Zelensky to consider the value of Ukrainian people's lives. What are the Ukrainian people fighting for?"

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Zhejiang Agricultural and Forestry University

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Games such as "Honor of Kings", "Identity V", "World of Tanks", and "Three Kingdoms Online" will all start maintenance around May 35th.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 2, a memorial service was held at the Scottish Memorial in Edinburgh to commemorate the 35th anniversary of the June 4 incident.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 2, commemoration of the 35th anniversary of the June 4th Incident in Tokyo, Japan

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
June 1, Nanning, Guangxi. The "Creation Magic Training" youth training camp was exposed online, where the traffic officer repeatedly pushed the child's head into the water and lifted it up. On the 2nd, the staff of the training camp told reporters: It is to let the children break through psychologically, and pay more attention to the safety of children than anyone else. 
As of now, the video has been deleted.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 3, Tietou released a video saying that he had returned to China at 5 a.m. the next day after peeing and graffitiing at the Yasukuni Shrine. On the same day, at the regular press conference of the Chinese Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Mao Ning responded to Tietou's peeing and graffitiing at the Yasukuni Shrine, saying that Japan should truly reflect on its history of aggression and win the trust of its Asian neighbors and the international community through actions. At the same time, he reminded Chinese citizens abroad to abide by local laws and express their demands rationally.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 2, Boston commemorates the 35th anniversary of the June 4th Incident

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 2, the front page of the 1918th issue of Hong Kong's "Times Forum" (June 2, 2024) was left blank.
Only one line of text was left: "This issue's front page feature was not published due to some reasons, and I hope readers will forgive me."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Some netizens have discovered that when entering the Tiananmen Gate Tower reservation website, a pop-up window will appear stating that “Tiananmen Gate Tower will be closed all day on June 4th.”

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: A Weibo post by the Chinese Academy of History on May 30 regarding Mao Zedong’s “Oppose Surrender”: “If we fight, we will perish; if we don’t fight, we will survive—this is the conclusion of all capitulationists” has been blocked.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 3, Yangjiang, Guangdong. A man stood on the roof of a car and put a knife to his neck.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On June 3, slogans appeared on the streets of Gongzhuling City, Changchun, Jilin Province

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: Xu Hui's speech advising Zelensky has attracted criticism from many netizens in China. Some netizens even denounced him as "Xu Jingwei" and "capitulationist major general". So far, most official media have removed the news.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: It is worth mentioning that Wang Jingwei also accused the Chinese military and civilians who were still persisting in the anti-Japanese war of "completely losing the soul of East Asians, and only a shell for the British and Americans to command" and "advocating to fight the war to the end, not hesitating to waste the country's only vitality, exhaust the remaining energy of the nation, make China never hope for revival, and make the people suffer."

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 3, the owners of Red Star Macalline in Leshan, Sichuan Province, locked their doors to protect their rights because they owed rent to the owners for half a year.
These owners all bought the rent-returning grid shops seven or eight years ago. Over the years, these more than 500 owners have not only been unable to obtain property rights certificates (Red Star Macalline failed the fire inspection), but also experienced rent exemptions and halving of income due to the epidemic, and now have directly owed rent for half a year.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 3, Auckland, New Zealand: Photo exhibition commemorating the 35th anniversary of the June 4th Incident

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: On the evening of June 3, at the 64th candlelight vigil in Christchurch, South Island, New Zealand, the organizer was harassed by two unidentified men.

name: 李老师不是你老师
content: June 2, Zhengzhou, Henan, Huawei car owners defend their rights

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
On June 3, in Yubei District, Chongqing, because the promised school district of Chongqing Bonded Port No. 8 Middle School was not fulfilled, the school district was divided into Airport Experimental Middle School 8 kilometers away.
On that day, the owners of five communities, including Blueray Furong Mansion, Vanke City Garden, Dongyuan Yueyin Wanchuan, Zhongjiao Shiyuan Yaji, and China Railway Construction Shanyu Taoyuan, jointly defended their rights.
During the period, there were many scuffles with the police, and many owners were arrested

name: 李老师不是你老师
content:
"Every tree and grass looks like an enemy"
Around 8:30 pm on June 3, the second-year students of Wuwei No. 1 Middle School planned to organize a shouting activity to cheer up the seniors who were about to take the college entrance examination.
However, during the discussion, the school learned the news in advance, which led to the school's emergency response to close the radio station in advance, order a strict investigation, and give the radio station director a demerit.
It was reported online that a large number of police officers appeared at the scene, but no photos of the scene were leaked.
